body_html:
Sent out a proposed fix for it internally (did it there because it's easier to test). Don't worry about it :)

Essentially just passed the Device as a parameter and changed it to:
auto out_flat = out_tensor->flat<T>();
out_flat.device(ctx->eigen_device<Device>()) = out_flat.constant(T(0));
body:
Sent out a proposed fix for it internally (did it there because it's easier to test). Don't worry about it :)

Essentially just passed the Device as a parameter and changed it to:
`auto out_flat = out_tensor->flat<T>();`
`out_flat.device(ctx->eigen_device<Device>()) = out_flat.constant(T(0));`
